wikipedia_page.main: Prof George Alexander Gibson FRSE LLD (19 April 1858–1 April 1930) was a Scottish mathematician and academic author.

response: His nephew was the noted mathematician Prof George Alexander Gibson FRSE (1858-1930).
In 1921 he was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh. His proposers were George Alexander Gibson, Andrew Gray, James Gordon Gray, and Robert Alexander Houston.
